com.percussion.services.filter
Interface IPSFilterService

All Superinterfaces:
IPSCataloger
public interface IPSFilterService
extends IPSCataloger

The filter services manages item filters and applies the item filters to lists of content ids. The filter service is a higher level service that uses other services to implement filtering.

Author:
dougrand

Method Detail

createFilter

IPSItemFilter createFilter(String name,
                           String description)
Create a new item filter

Parameters:
name - a unique name, never null or empty
description - a description, may be null or empty
Returns:
a newly created filter object

loadFilter

List<IPSItemFilter> loadFilter(List<IPSGuid> ids)
                               throws com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException
Load one or more filters from the guids

Parameters:
ids - a list of guids, may not be empty, never null
Returns:
a list of filter objects, never null or empty
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if one or more ids are not found or invalid

loadFilter

IPSItemFilter loadFilter(IPSGuid id)
                         throws com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException
Load the item filter for the supplied id.

Parameters:
id - the id of the item filter to load, not null.
Returns:
the loaded item filter, never null.
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if no filter was found for the supplied id.

findFilterByName

IPSItemFilter findFilterByName(String name)
                               throws PSFilterException
Loads one filter by name. The returned filter should be considered read-only as this method uses an in-memory cache that is shared between threads.

Parameters:
name - name of filter, never null or empty
Returns:
the item filter, never null
Throws:
PSFilterException - if no filter is found with the given name

findFilterByID

IPSItemFilter findFilterByID(IPSGuid id)
Loads one filter by id. The returned filter should be considered read-only as this method uses an in-memory cache that is shared between threads.

Parameters:
id - id of filter, never null.
Returns:
the item filter, may be null if filter not found.

findFiltersByName

List<IPSItemFilter> findFiltersByName(String name)
Find all filters for the supplied name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the filter to find, may be null or empty. Finds all filters if null or empty, sql type (%) wildcards are supported.
Returns:
a list with all found item filters for the supplied name, never null, may be empty, ascending alpha ordered by name.

findFilterByAuthType

IPSItemFilter findFilterByAuthType(int authtype)
                                   throws PSFilterException
Loads one filter by the legacy authtype

Parameters:
authtype - the authtype
Returns:
the item filter, never null
Throws:
PSFilterException - if no filter is found with the given authtype

findAllFilters

List<IPSItemFilter> findAllFilters()
Get all the filters known to the system

Returns:
a list of known filters, never null

saveFilter

void saveFilter(IPSItemFilter filter)
                throws PSFilterException
Saves or updates the filter to the repository

Parameters:
filter - the filter, never null
Throws:
PSFilterException - if there is a problem storing into the repository

deleteFilter

void deleteFilter(IPSItemFilter filter)
Delete a filter from the repository, but will throw an exception if there is an object with a reference to the filter.

Parameters:
filter - the filter, never null

createRuleDef

IPSItemFilterRuleDef createRuleDef(String rule,
                                   Map<String,String> params)
                                   throws PSFilterException
Create a new rule def. Note that rule definitions can be added or removed from an IPSItemFilter but not cataloged, saved, loaded or otherwise manipulated by themselves.

Parameters:
rule - the rule, never null pr empty
params - the parameters, never null but may be empty
Returns:
the rule def, never null
Throws:
PSFilterException - if the rule is not found

loadUnmodifiableFilter

IPSItemFilter loadUnmodifiableFilter(IPSGuid filterId)
                                     throws com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException
Load a filter using an internal in-memory cache for improved performance. The returned filter object should not be modified.

Parameters:
filterId - the id of the filter to load, never null
Returns:
the requested filter, see loadFilter(IPSGuid) for the semantics
Throws:
com.percussion.services.error.PSNotFoundException - if the filter is not found.
